descriptionHtml:
EYEBall Texture Replacer by Ghogiel 
**************************************************************
Author: Textures by Ghogiel
Version: 1.0


*************************
Description
*************************
A texture replacer for Human, Dunmer, Altmer, Bosmer, Orismer and vampire eyes.
(currently does not include Khajiit, Argonian or werewolf eyes)

*************************
Installation
*************************

Place folder in data folder. 


*************************
Terms of Use
*************************
For use as a texture replacer in Skyrim by Bethesda only.
Do not re-upload these files to any website. 
Not for use in any commercial manner. Do not generate revenue with these files.
author: Ghogiel
